attributes.action: CLOSE THE BIASED TOXIC TORY BBC DOWN.
attributes.background:
THE BBC CANNOT REMAIN IMPARTIAL IN ITS POLITICAL PROGRAMMES OR INTERVIEWS.
ITS A TOXIC TORY LED CHANNEL THAT FAVOURS TORIES COMMENTS ABOVE THE LABOUR PARTY . AND PRESENTERS LIKE MARR ANDREW NEIL ECT ARE DISPICABLE NOT ALLOWING A QUESTION TO BE ANSWERED BY LABOUR MP'S WITHOUT TALKING OVER THEM

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

If you'd like the TV licence fee to be abolished, so that the BBC receives no public funding, you may want to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/200239

If you'd like to make a complaint about the BBC, you can find out how to do that here:

http://www.bbc.co.uk/complaints/
